appliance_classification.reason: The tool has double or reinforced insulation, as indicated by the Protection Class II symbol (double square) present on the label. This eliminates the need for a protective earth connection.

visual_inspection.name: Visual Inspection
visual_inspection.description: Covers checks of physical appearance, surface quality, labeling, and visible defects

items.name: Is there damage to the casing
items.description: cables or the plug? Please make sure that you inspect the device thoroughly.

electrical_inspection.name: Electrical Inspection
electrical_inspection.description: Includes tests of wiring, connections, insulation, and compliance with electrical safety standards

items.name: Class II Insulation Integrity
items.description: Insulation resistance verification for Class II devices according to 5.4 (when feasible). Minimum: 2.0MΩ

items.name: Touch Current Verification
items.description: Contact current measurement for Class II/III devices per 5.6 (after passed insulation test). Limit: ≤0.5mA

items.name: Alternative Leakage Test (Class II/III)
items.description: Substitute leakage measurement for Class II/III devices per 5.7 (alternative to 5.6). Limit: ≤0.5mA

functional_inspection.name: Functional Inspection
functional_inspection.description: Validates that the item operates as intended under normal conditions

items.name: Does the device power on and function correctly?
items.description: Validate normal operation and safety features

items.name: Are there any unusual noises
items.description: smells, or vibrations during operation? Validate normal operation and safety features
